stlib.datatypes.unit.spatial.util

Class MovableFace

  • java.lang.Object
    • stlib.datatypes.unit.spatial.util.MovableFace
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MovableSpatial, MovableFaceIF

    public class MovableFace
extends java.lang.Object
implements MovableFaceIF
    This class represents 'MovableFace' objects, which are generally used to build 'UnitRegion' objects.
    This objects can have moving holes.
    Author:
    Markus Fuessel

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private MovableCycleIF movingBoundary
      Outer moving boundary of this 'MovableFace'
      private java.util.List<MovableCycleIF> movingHoles
      List with moving holes this 'MovableFace' may contain

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MovableFace(MovableCycleIF movingBoundary)
      Constructor for a simple 'MovableFace' object without holes.
      MovableFace(MovableCycleIF movingBoundary, java.util.List<MovableCycleIF> movingHoles)
      Constructor for a 'MovableFace', possible with holes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Get the projection bounding box of this 'MovableFace' object

      This method returns a 'FaceIF' which is valid at the passed time instant within the period of the movement of this 'MovableFaceIF'

    • Constructor Detail

      • MovableFace

        public MovableFace(MovableCycleIF movingBoundary)
        Constructor for a simple 'MovableFace' object without holes.
        Parameters:
        movingBoundary - - outer boundary of this 'MovableFace', a 'MovableCycleIF' object

      • MovableFace

        public MovableFace(MovableCycleIF movingBoundary,
                   java.util.List<MovableCycleIF> movingHoles)
        Constructor for a 'MovableFace', possible with holes.
        The holes have to be inside the outer boundary for the complete movement.
        The holes must not intersect.
        Parameters:
        movingBoundary - - outer boundary of this 'MovableFace', a 'MovableCycleIF' object
        movingHoles - - List of movingHoles, 'MovableCycleIF' objects

        public FaceIF getValue(PeriodIF movementPeriod,

        Description copied from interface: MovableFaceIF
